extendedInfo.description: Canadian Citizenship Test made easy, based on the new study guide called Discover Canada: The Rights and Responsibilities of Citizenship. Includes random tests, real test simulations, advanced result analysis, tests by chapter and "express" training. Our database contains more than 500 selected questions.

reviews.title: Too many trivial questions.
reviews.comment: A lot of the questions can\'t even be found in the Discover Canada guide. I suspect that those are from previous edition of study guide. Some questions are also outdated. Overall a good aid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good App
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using it for a while now and I\'m satisfied with the application - it is well made and useful for the self study and test sim. 4 star only since there are no updates since feb15 2011 / also no info update on politics and government - would like to see it update for the upcoming tests of 2012. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 100 times more difficult
reviews.comment: This this application is like 100 * more difficult than it actual test. I don\'t recommend anyone to download this app. You can find more realistic question online for free
reviews.author: Babak Ebrahimi

reviews.comment: very helpful. i love it.i hope i passed my exam
reviews.author: A Google User
